Night Shift listens carefully to both Lord Elder and Kup.  He knew that he =
had a sizeable charade to pull off, and he realizes that he will have to ac=
t like an enemy if he's to get Hydras to trust him. He raises a brow in tho=
ught.

" You guys both raise really important points.  I'm gonna have ta do=
 things in reverse though, that way, when I do shoot ya Kup, that'll show '=
em that yeah, I'm on their side, and they can trust me.  Once that's all do=
ne, I'll probably be able ta get my hands on the info.  Then I'll relay tha=
t back remotely here ta the base....  But we really gotta make this look co=
nvincing...  "

Tucson nodds.

"He's right...  Wait a minute, Kup, what if =
he went one on one with me instead? I really hate to see you get all banged=
 up because he's not exactly the most gentile fighters known on Cybertron a=
nd neither am I.  Hydras wants my aft on a silver platter and to see Night =
Shift beating the scrap out of me might even amuse him."

Night Shift gives=
 Tucson a look.

"I dunno...  You already took enough dents in this fight b=
uddy."

Tucson grins.

"No, it's all right, honestly.  It will give me an e=
xcuse to also get my optics repaired.  Now, since you'll be beating me up, =
you could return to the dark fortress with a piece of my metal, as a trophy=
 for Hydras..  Let's say, one of my rear view mirrors perhaps?"

Night Shif=
t cringes.

"Woah you sure ya want me ta do that?"

Tucson nodds.

" Positi=
ve.  And once you're in the fortress I want you to see if you can locate Wi=
ndlord, as well as Nightlight.  Rodimus may already become obvious to you w=
hen you arrive there.  Just be sure to keep yourself on a Decepticon energy=
 signature, and not on the Autobot one."

Night Shift gives him a thumbs up=
.

"Gotchya.  Okaaaay, now ta stage it...  But first Kup wants ta know if y=
a picked up on Nightlight."

Tucson nodds. 

"I did, I almost reached her, =
but she was unconscious.  No telling what they've done to her now."

Night =
Shift pats him on the shoulder.

"That's where I come in.  No worries, hope=
 ya don't mind gettn' a few more dents, Wheels."

Tucson chuckles.

"All ri=
ght, enough joking around, I suppose we should stage a chase of some sort?"=


Night Shift listens intently.

"Yeah, that would work..  Okay, I got it, =
here's how we'll start it..  I'll call Hydras and let 'em know that I corne=
red ya on the way ta the Ark'n I'm givn' chase.  You make like you're tryn'=
 ta get away from me, and then we transform'n duke it out in the open where=
 I hope Hydras will catch sight of us.  After that, I beat the scrap outa y=
a, and sorry if I do hurt ya in advance, I promise I'll make it up ta ya.  =
And then after that, I leave you out there ta rust helplessly out on the fi=
eld.  It's at that time that you radio Lord Elder'n tell 'em that you've be=
en jumped by me, a Decepticon."

Tucson nodds.

"I got it.  All right.  Lor=
d Elder, Kup, I want you to keep this channel open to Hydras, as things unf=
old.  He'll want to hear how the chase is going, and probably want to hear =
Night Shift's act against me.  That should spark some curiosity among him o=
r his comrades. With that said, it's go time."

They transform into SUV mod=
es and drive outside where Night Shift now turns from Autobot into Deceptic=
on.  The chase begins quickly and furiously around the Ark, as Tucson tries=
 to lure Night Shift away.

" Chase me all you want, you're not getting you=
r hands on the Matrix!"

Night Shift tries to catch up to him and comes bum=
per to bumper with Tucson.  He slams into his side fender, trying to get hi=
m to tip over, with a powerful and loud smack.

" We'll just have ta see ab=
out that pretty boy! "

The chase appears convincing as Night Shift now man=
ages to spin Tucson out of control as they both transform into Robot mode, =
begining the next phase of their plan.   A battle erupts between the two of=
 them as they clash fists, kicks upper cuts and other dangerous combative m=
oves toward each other.

e's a geniuos  when he is involved in hi-tech stuff. He reprogramed Nightli=
ght once and when we tried to reprogram her  back to her Maximal status we =
almost loss her..."Kupp looked to a sleepy elita and added"We may need a co=
py of their reprograming programs and Before attemp to rescue them we will =
need to know how bring them back; we also have to locate windlord, and know=
 what had happened to him, he is most likely alive and reprogramed... You m=
ay need a copy of his signature"

 Nightshift, you should be carefull and not made them suspect about you. I =
guess that we have to create a conflict  in order Hydras see you shooting u=
s and if that help you to gain his trust, I'm volunteer to be hit... but  i=
t must be a real one, even if that mean several days in the CR." and lookin=
g to Tucson, he said "One question Tucson, before we start this mission: di=
d you be able to get contact to Nightlight?"

ful and
> curious. "I have read reports about you Nightshift, but I see the=
y did
> not do you or Tuscon Justice." he said as he stood up.
> 
> As Tusc=
on and Nightshift laid out their plan, his optics followed
> them, flipping=
 from one bot to the other as they bounced off of each
> other.
> 
> "Inter=
esting." he said as he folded his arms over his chest, rubbing
> his chin s=
peculatively. "Hydras is no fool" he said slowly, his
> thoughts obviously =
churning. "and he is not usually the trusting sort.
> I can imagine with th=
e last little break in, he will probably be less
> so."
>

wned thoughtfully, "It might work though, but you are
> going to have to be=
 very careful. We don't want another missing
> comrade."
